item.description:
For those of you who joined us for RON'S ALL STAR BIRTHDAY BASH AT JOHNNIES ON THE SIDE, you already know what a blast we had.
Now we are going to do it again at Raffael's on Nantasket Beach. Yes, Diana is going south for this one so I guess "HULL just FROZE OVER"!

For a more detailed description of this event and to purchase your ticket go to www.musicnotnoise.com

This event sells out FAST. Please rsvp yes after[/i] you have purchased your ticket. You can either use pay pal or send a check directly to Paul Schlosberg. His info is on the web site.

Be there or be square!
item.how_to_find_us: Resevation under Boston Baby Boomers/ Shelley's table

item.name: RON DELLA CHIESA will host a "STRICTLY SINATRA MUSIC AMERICA DANCE PARTY"
